          <title>
            <string language="en">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Destillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distillation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distillazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Destilación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the set-up to separate water from a salty water solution through distillation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salty water solution</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Installation zum 
unterschiedlichen Wasser von einer salzigen Wasserlösung durch 
Destillation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation à l'eau
séparée d'une solution salée de l'eau par la distillation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação à água 
separada de uma solução salty da água com o distillation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto ad 
acqua separata da una soluzione salata dell'acqua con distillazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση για να 
χωρίσει το ύδωρ από μια αλμυρή λύση ύδατος μέσω της απόσταξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición al agua
separada de una solución salada del agua con la destilación.</string>
          </description>
